changeSet.author: John Barnard
changeSet.sql: UPDATE generations SET "businessName" = "statementData"->>'businessName', frn = ("statementData"->>'frn')::BIGINT, sbi = ("statementData"->>'sbi')::INTEGER, "addressLine1" = "statementData"->>'addressLine1', "addressLine2" = "statementData"->>'addressLine2', "addressLine3" = "statementData"->>'addressLine3', "addressLine4" = "statementData"->>'addressLine4', "addressLine5" = "statementData"->>'addressLine5', postcode = "statementData"->>'postcode', email = "statementData"->>'email', "schemeName" = "statementData"->>'schemeName', "schemeShortName" = "statementData"->>'schemeShortName', "schemeYear" = "statementData"->>'schemeYear', "schemeFrequency" = "statementData"->>'schemeFrequency' WHERE "statementData" IS NOT NULL;
